snippet: A commuter helicopter carrying several dozen passengers, including at least 11 children, crashed in a remote Russian region on Tuesday, killing 23.
abstract: Commuter helicopter carrying several dozen passengers, including at least 11 children, crashes in remote Russian region of Siberia, killing 23 and prompting frantic search for survivors.
lead_paragraph: A commuter helicopter carrying several dozen passengers, including at least 11 children, crashed in a remote Russian region on Tuesday, killing 23.

headline.main: Russia: 23 Dead, Others Stranded in Siberian Helicopter Crash
headline.print_headline: Russia: 23 Dead, Others Stranded In Siberian Helicopter Crash
